item.title: You can have a Claire Luxton experience in Dubai this July
item.description:
Source: InterContinental Hotels & Resorts. Visitors can enjoy a unique experience showcasing the work of artist Claire Luxton at select hotels, such as the InterContinental Dubai Festival City. InterContinental Hotels & Resorts, part of IHG Hotels & Resorts Luxury and Lifestyle Collection, has partnered with British artist Claire Luxton to launch a series of immersive guest experiences. Available at various hotels, including the InterContinental Dubai Festival City, until mid-July, these experiences celebrate global travel and exploration through the artistic vision of Claire Luxton...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/you-can-have-a-claire-luxton-experience-in-dubai-this-july/
